Posts.Content: cck wrote: First time posting, been reading ever since my DX, but I  was so overwhelmed with it all I could only read what you all were saying.  Now that I have wraped my brain around all this and Im almost done WHAM back to surgery.  A quick over view DX with DCIS in Oct 08 had BM in December of 08, TE then exchange in May 09.  Right implant didn't work, scar tissue, now back in Oct 14,  to fix right side, also a little caving? is that what they call it? on the left side PS wants to take belly fat (using lipo) and use that to fill in.  Not that I mind him taking out the fat (would be able to stop doing situps YA!!!)  just worried about lipo.  PS said I would be sore for 2/3 weeks and brused, but you ladies know every thing and don't hold back on the truth so I need to really know how bad this is going to be.  Would love any feed back. This place has been my saving grace   Thank's to all   Dx 10/18/2008, DCIS, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Back to Surgery cck mawhinney
